dsOverview.title: EDIS TIROS-N 1024 Mosaic Data for FGGE, 1979Jan-Jun

summary.p: The Environmental Data and Information Service (EDIS) has provided global gridded visible satellite data from the Television and Infrared Observation Satellite (TIROS) for the period from January to June 1979 in support of the First GARP Global Experiment (FGGE).

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Visible Wavelengths > Visible Imagery
dsOverview.supportsProject: GARP/FGGE > Global Atmospheric Research Program/First Garp Global Experiment (GARP/FGGE)
